trans-unit.source: Windows developer (C#, .Net, XAML and SQL Server), social media and web master. Work for myself. Read my social accounts and you gonna discover more who I am.
trans-unit.target: Windows developer (C#, .Net, XAML and SQL Server), social media and web master. Work for myself. Read my social accounts and you gonna discover more who I am.

trans-unit.source: Combining regular and irregular verbs of our Portuguese language in all tenses (Present, Imperfect, Perfect Present, more-than-perfect past, future, future of this, the present conditional, imperfect subjunctive tense, future subjunctive, imperative , infinitive and gerund).
trans-unit.target: Combining regular and irregular verbs of our Portuguese language in all tenses (Present, Imperfect, Perfect Present, more-than-perfect past, future, future of this, the present conditional, imperfect subjunctive tense, future subjunctive, imperative , infinitive and gerund).

trans-unit.source: Hey, here is some of my thoughts on your app, and how can you improve it:
trans-unit.target: Hey, here is some of my thoughts on your app, and how can you improve it:

trans-unit.source: Those who never played such a game like this or have never heard that throw the first stone! The best game of truth and consequence that the Windows Store has seen so far, has several bottles according to the occasion (in family, in the square, between friends, drunk, with the bests , alone,in the classroom and among couples) , with questions and pre-defined challenges is fun in the right esste application!
trans-unit.target: Those who never played such a game like this or have never heard that throw the first stone! The best game of truth and consequence that the Windows Store has seen so far, has several bottles according to the occasion (in family, in the square, between friends, drunk, with the bests , alone,in the classroom and among couples) , with questions and pre-defined challenges is fun in the right esste application!

trans-unit.source: Calculate and converts easily minutes, turning in hours, days, or even years or seconds. Perfect app for those who like to do marathons series and need to know how many episodes you can watch up to your next appointment, or you going to the movies and you want to eat something later, but can not miss the bus schedule. Do not waste time counting!
trans-unit.target: Calculate and converts easily minutes, turning in hours, days, or even years or seconds. Perfect app for those who like to do marathons series and need to know how many episodes you can watch up to your next appointment, or you going to the movies and you want to eat something later, but can not miss the bus schedule. Do not waste time counting!

trans-unit.source: Isn't rare occasions where we need to give away someone with this application is easy. Just add the track numbers to be drawn and it will do the work for you. Try it.
trans-unit.target: Isn't rare occasions where we need to give away someone with this application is easy. Just add the track numbers to be drawn and it will do the work for you. Try it.

trans-unit.source: A game can destroy as well as to strengthen friendships. Take stronger drink, or that is closer to you, and will play the famous 'I Never ever' , where every time you've done something shown on the screen you should drink a sip. The rule is simple, the game is known, then what are you waiting? Call your closest friends for a round of 'I never ever'.
trans-unit.target: A game can destroy as well as to strengthen friendships. Take stronger drink, or that is closer to you, and will play the famous 'I Never ever' , where every time you've done something shown on the screen you should drink a sip. The rule is simple, the game is known, then what are you waiting? Call your closest friends for a round of 'I never ever'.

trans-unit.source: Your feedback help me improve this app. If you like it, please, rate with 5 star so, that way, I continue to create new functions and updates.

trans-unit.source: Make a normal account using minutes and than, when you get the result, it will appear as hours. Awesome, right?

trans-unit.source: You can set a timer for changing number every second or you can define how many seconds wait until choose a new number.
trans-unit.target: You can set a timer for changing number every second or you can define how many seconds wait until choose a new number.
